title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 442.3 - Public authorized agency
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 442.3 - Public authorized agency

State Regulations
A social services official may be authorized by the
department to operate an institution for children, provided that such facility
complies with the provisions of this Part; provided further that such official
establishes the need therefor and that suitable care is not otherwise available
for children under the care of such official. Application for such approval by
the department shall be made in accordance with the requirements for the
issuance of an operating certificate, as specified in Parts 476 and 477 of this

Title. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18
ยง
442.3

Amended

New

York State Register December 23, 2015/Volume XXXVII, Issue 51, eff. 12/23/2015

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
